response: "{ \"title\": \"Maximum Sum of Subarray\", \"description\": \"Write a function `max_sum_subarray` that takes an array of integers as input and returns the maximum sum of any subarray within the given array.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of any subarray within the given array.\\n\", \"code\": \"\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    max_sum = float('-inf')\\n    current_sum = 0\\n\\n    for num in arr:\\n        current_sum += num\\n        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)\\n        \\n        if current_sum < 0:\\n            current_sum = 0\\n\\n    return max_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_subarray([-2,1,-3,4,-1,2,1,-5,4]) == 6\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([1,-3,2,3,-1]) == 4\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([0, -1, 2, -2, 3, -2, 2, -1, 2]) == 7\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([-1, 2, 5, -6]) == 7\"] }"
